reviews.review: Portal and its sequel are surprisingly both easy to pick up and hard to master. I enjoyed even playing with my Dad. Portal 2 especially has a variety of character and additional story. The puzzles are wonderful, and the custom room maker is surprisingly intuitive. I was surprised the amount of downtime between full-on puzzles in the single-player campaign, but the game is laid-back to a degree after all. This game is absolutely a classic.

İnanılmaz bir oyun. Keşke ilki kadar kısa olsaydı. 6. bölümden sonra baya sıkıcılaştı ancak birkaç yeni bulmaca mekaniğiyle durumu biraz toparlamışlar. Bu tarz oyunlarda mekanikler çok fazla olmadığı için ve oyun yalnızca level design üzerinden yürüdüğünden, 8 saatin üzerindeki bir oynanış oyunu sıkıcılaştırıyor. Bu oyun 4-6 saat arası bir oynanışı olsaydı mükemmel olurdu. Şu haliyle de harika ve efsane bir oyun.

Wheatley（ウィートレイ）のおかげで出だしから最後まで洋画を題材にしたスピーディーなアトラクションに乗っているような気分になれました。
いろいろなギミックが加わったため難易度は前作より上がったように思えます。数日空けてやっといろいろ気づいてクリアできたステージもありました。
前作とつながりがあるので出来れば後にプレイしたほうが楽しめます。
特にGLaDOS（グラドス）のイメージがかなり変わります。

I've played this game about five times,four times on the Xbox and once on pc. Look i'm a nerd diva for this game. I could jat your ear off about how much I love the lore and the game play. So i'm just going to summarize it as best as I can. Portal 2 in my opinion is way better than the first, its way more story driven with actual interesting and fun characters you meet along the way. If you like puzzle games than wow you're really going to enjoy this! amazingly addictive portal and liquid mechanics that are just so fun and satisfying to help solve puzzles, while also being filled in with the story line. Valve has done an amazing job with their cute and fun Easter eggs than can help make the lore more clearer. This is one of my favorite games right up there with the Bioshock series. If you like great lore driven action puzzle games than this game is going to hit your sweet spot! and if you don't like it well then that's okay! but none the less surprising. :)
Very fun, totally recommend, have played the entire game through almost five or six times.
Great game with some solid head-scratching puzzles.

Portal 2 is another masterpiece of gaming history and honestly might be the best sequel ever. After defeating GLaDOS and being dragged back inside you're forced once again to test.
This game is longer than Portal and it manages to be fantastic, the humour set in the last game is back same with the mechanics with some more added throughout the game. The graphics are improved upon it's predecessor. Science isn't about WHY it's about WHY NOT! and WHY NOT enjoy this jewel of gaming?

Bueno me acabe Portal 2, realmente me gusto más que el uno, ya que me gusto como implementaron la historia y ver como era Aperture en el pasado, algo que también me gusto fueron las nuevas mecánicas en los puzles y los diálogos que realizan Glados y Wheatley, en conclusión es un gran juego…compralo.
